fullText: Despite a game cast and flashy production numbers, this adaptation of the Whoopi Goldberg movie feels more like going through the motions than experiencing genuine theatrical magic.
dtliExcerpt: Despite a game cast and flashy production numbers, this adaptation of the Whoopi Goldberg movie feels more like going through the motions than experiencing genuine theatrical magic.
